name: 4.Supplier Master Data Creation Steps
content:
Supplier Master Data


This dataset is created from multiple datasets and represents the supplier master data. From this dataset we then create multiple other datasets needed by the Optimization Algorithm.


  • Supplier
  • Product
  • lon/lat
  • Capacity
  • Price
  • Min Order Quantity
  • Supplier Maximum Capacity
  • Cost Per Unit
  • Defect Rate
  • Thickness
  • Length


Supplier Master Data Creation


This workflow prepares the final supplier-product master dataset used as input to the supplier allocation optimization model. It consolidates product pricing, supplier metadata, and capacity inputs into a single structured output.


Workflow Overview (04-Supplier-Master-Data-Creation-Leena)


1. Raw Data Ingestion

  • Source Files:
  • global_price_data.csv (contains supplier-product pricing and details)
  • VendorSearchwithAddressesSWResults328.csv (contains supplier metadata with location details)
  • capacity_and_quantity_output.csv (contains supplier-level capacity and min order guidance)
  • Final-Tube-Data.csv (used to align with product specs if required)
  • Final-Demands-Data.csv (used to match relevant products for demand planning)
  • Extracted Fields from Structured Columns in global_price_data.csv:
  • Product_Id
  • Supplier_Id
  • Product_Details
  • Supplier_Address_Label
  • AddressLabel
  • Product_Type
  • Tube_OD
  • Tube_Length
  • Monthly price fields: Jan24, Feb24, ..., Dec24
  • Unit_Cost (derived as the average of all available monthly prices)



2. Data Cleaning

  • Trimmed whitespace and standardized casing for consistent joins
  • Filtered to include only Torque Tube-related products
  • Excluded dummy or placeholder suppliers

3. Unit Cost Calculation

  • Averaged monthly cost data across JanÃ¢ÂÂDec 2024 to compute Unit_Cost

4. Join with Supplier Metadata

  • Mapped Supplier_Id to full names, lat/long, and address labels from vendor records

5. Join with Product-Demand Mapping

  • Ensured only relevant Product_Ids tied to demand are included

6. Join with Capacity and Min Order Info

  • Fuzzy-joined with capacity_and_quantity_output.csv using supplier names
  • Merged fields:
  • MinPlanningGuidance Ã¢ÂÂ used as minimum order quantity
  • SupplierTotalCapacity Ã¢ÂÂ used as supplier capacity
  • SupplierTarget and MinVolumeCommitted are retained for reference or optional logic

Output: Master-Supplier-Product-Info.csv

Final dataset includes:

  • Supplier_Id, Supplier_Name, Latitude, Longitude
  • Product_Id, Product_Details, Unit_Cost
  • MinPlanningGuidance, SupplierTotalCapacity
  • Supplier (used for joining with capacity input)
